mapper.insert: insert into public_schema.Product_manufacturing (m_date, p_no, p_name, p_price, m_num, p_limitD) values(#{m_date}, #{p_no}, #{p_name}, #{p_price}, #{m_num}, #{p_limitD})
mapper.delete: delete from public_schema.Product_manufacturing WHERE p_no = #{p_no} AND m_date = #{m_date} AND p_limitD = #{p_limitD}
mapper.select: select * from public_schema.productNum WHERE p_no = #{p_no} OR p_name = #{p_name};
